group_1.textLeft: Oh...it's really got that haunted vibe...

group_1.textRight: I heard there's a super old shrine in the@deepest part?
This chill... It feels like something could@come crawling out any second.

group_1.textLeft: | ...A drop in temperature brings out ghosts...? |

group_1.textRight: When a ghost appears, it makes you feel chills.@Scary stories make it feel colder.
It's the norm.

group_1.textLeft: | ...Is that so? |

group_1.textRight: How about it, Sakurako?@Do you think it's super spooky?

group_1.textLeft: | ...I find it quiet, but not scary, I suppose. |
| What scares you about this place? |

group_1.textRight: Th-that's...

group_1.textLeft: That's a tough question...

group_1.textCenter: It comes from the overall atmosphere.

group_1.textRight: Ahh, Sakurako.

group_1.textLeft: | Yes? |

group_1.textRight: When you come to a strange place with no@sign of people,
doesn't it make you worry that something@could be lurking?

group_1.textLeft: | ...No, I'll know if there's any suspicious@presence nearby. |

group_1.textRight: Would you, now...
When you come to a dark place, don't you think...
"Waaah... So scaaary..."@[chara:305350:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305350:lipSynch_1][chara:305350:cheek_0][chara:305350:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Or something like that?
Because, you know, you totally can't see@anything...

group_1.textLeft: | ...I don't. |
| Although I do need to be careful not to trip@or collide with something. |

group_1.textRight: ...Aghhh, we can't get the message acrooooss...!

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Where did Ryo go?

group_1.textRight: Huh?
Were you startled?

group_1.textLeft: | If someone calls out to me from behind, when I thought they weren't there... |
| Even I would be startled... |

group_1.textRight: Oh! So you were scared?

group_1.textLeft: | No, just surprised... |

group_1.textRight: ...It's no use.
Catching people off guard and startling them@is one of the most classic scare tactics.

group_1.textLeft: It's a move often used in horror movies.

group_1.textRight: By the way, have you ever watched@horror movies?

group_1.textLeft: | Yes, they're incredibly irrational. |

group_1.textRight: Huh? But if you were startled, doesn't that mean@you were scared?

group_1.textLeft: | ...I believe that the horror of a ghost story is@different... |
| ...There's something more to a ghost story@than just being startled. |
| ...I can't properly explain it, because I don't@know what that is... |

group_1.textRight: No, I totally get what you mean.
It's that icky feeling that's so important in@ghost stories.

group_1.textLeft: | Perhaps so. |
You understand it in theory, but actually@experiencing it...
That's a tricky problem...

group_1.textRight: I'm getting fired up.
I really hope Sakurako can understand how@frightening ghost stories can be.
Okey-dokey, why don't we head deeper into@the cave now?
It's only the entrance, and the real fun is just@beginning!

group_1.textLeft: | ...Now the real horror begins... |

group_1.textCenter: For some reason, it's starting to feel like@we're bad guys...
